title: Cassell's Magazine

renewed-contributions.title: The Moderate Murderer and the Honest Quack

additional-notes: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This magazine sometimes reprinted stories that originally appeared in other publications, and that might have active copyrights from those publications. The FictionMags index notes many of these reprints. We only here note the active renewal notices in CCE that specifically mention Cassell's magazine.
